700831f-b.text:
(1)
Crotona Parkway, east side, between East 176th Street and ETsmere Place (at the head of Fairmount Place), showing the St. Thomas Aquinas Roman Catholic Church. The apartment house, on the left,
bears No. 1922.
July 23, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date. The apartment house on the extreme
right bears No. 1896.
April 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
